content: उपोद्घातः {@--1@} A beginning, commencement {@--2@} An introduction, a preface. {@--3@} An example, an apposite argument or illustration. {@--4@} An occasion, medium, means; तत्प्रतिच्छंदकमुपोद्घातेन माधवांतिकमुपेयात् <ls>Māl. 1.</ls> {@--5@} Analysis, ascertaining the elements of anything. {@--6@} Alluding to, mentioning; <ls>Mu. 3.</ls>
